document.title: Moderate Upper Arch Braces Treatment
document.summary: This treatment plan for Alex involves the use of traditional braces to adjust the upper teeth. It is anticipated to take approximately 7-10 months to complete. The case is of moderate complexity, requiring a mixed approach to monitoring, which will include both remote and in-office visits. Some attachments will be utilized to assist with alignment adjustments. Whitening is not included in this treatment plan.
next_steps: Schedule initial fitting appointment for braces
Plan monitoring schedule with a mix of remote and in-office visits
Confirm attachment placement as needed during treatment
